channel.title: 英语语法 on The Sound of Music
channel.description: Recent content in 英语语法 on The Sound of Music

item.title: 英语时态
item.description: 12 Tensens Simple Continuous Perfect Perfect Continuous Past 1.1 1.2 1.3 1.4 Present 2.1 2.2 2.3 2.4 Future 3.1 3.2 3.3 3.4 1 Past What has happened. 1.1 Past Simple Summary We use the past simple to talk about something that happened at a specific time in the past. We can’t change it. We often use or imply expressions like yesterday, last week, last month. Form For All The People
